title: Items that allow Nasus to get obtain multiple stacks with one q
body: Basically, are there any items that have a passive that, when Nasus does his q, it does splash damage and if it kills a surrounding minion/monster, the death gives Nasus a stack?

replies.body: Crit nasus is fun, just get trinity, ie, shiv/essence reaver for unlimited q's, ghostblade, boots and spirit visage

haha, in black market mode, WHO CARES, there is an item that gives 1  flat, pure, unhampered ad instead XD

rito just made everyone ad a nasus

(this is a stack every 5 aa hits, then a use, melee only)

> Flesheater (Melee Only) ◾Recipe: Vampiric Scepter + Long Sword + 300g = 1460g 
> ◾Stats: 20 attack damage and 10% life steal 
> ◾Unique Passive: Basic attacks build Flesh charges. At 5 charges, you gain the ability to cast Flesheater. 
> ◾Unique Active - Flesheater: Rip the flesh from the target enemy minion, dealing 200 (+75% AD) true damage to the target and healing you for 50 (+75% AD) health, as well as permanently increasing this item's AD by 1. 
> ◾Flavor: "No need to sharpen after use."
